post.description:
Upload a file to S3/DigitalOcean Spaces. The file will be stored in appropriate folder based on its type:
- Images are stored in `/images/` folder
- Other files are stored in `/assets/` folder

Image optimization:
- JPEG, JPG, and PNG images are automatically converted to WebP format for better performance
- The response URL will have .webp extension for optimized images
- Other image formats and file types are uploaded as-is

error.message: Failed to upload file to S3

post.summary: Enqueue a background job (Recommended for valuations)
post.description:
Enqueues a job for asynchronous processing. Currently supports valuation jobs
that run the PhilValuate AI service in the background.

**This is the recommended endpoint for property valuations** as it provides:
- No timeout issues for complex valuations
- Job tracking and status monitoring
- Automatic retry on failures
- Better scalability under high load

Job lifecycle:
- Jobs are queued immediately and return a job ID
- Use the job ID to check status and retrieve results
- Completed jobs are retained for 1 hour or up to 1000 jobs
- Failed jobs are retained for 24 hours

query.propertyDescription: High floor unit with city view

get.description:
Retrieves the current status and result (if completed) of a background job.

Job states:
- **waiting**: Job is waiting to be processed
- **active**: Job is currently being processed
- **completed**: Job finished successfully (result available)
- **failed**: Job failed (error details available)
- **delayed**: Job is delayed and will be processed later
- **paused**: Job queue is paused

The response includes processing duration for completed/failed jobs.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The job ID returned from enqueue-job

get.description:
Retrieves a list of all configured job schedulers including their patterns,
intervals, and next execution times.

200.description: List of job schedulers retrieved successfully

get.description: Shows current environment values and IDs being used

post.description:
Initializes all configured job schedulers. This includes:
- Hourly warehouse processing
- Half-hourly warehouse processing
- Hourly condominium processing
- Half-hourly condominium processing
- Hourly house and lot processing
- Half-hourly house and lot processing
- Hourly vacant lot processing
- Half-hourly vacant lot processing
- Daily scrape cleanup (3 AM)
- Daily invalid records cleanup (2 AM)

500.description: Failed to set up job schedulers

delete.description: Removes all configured job schedulers. This will stop all scheduled executions.

post.description: Pauses a specific job scheduler by ID. The scheduler remains configured but won't execute.

schedulerId.description: ID of the scheduler to pause

post.description:
Resumes a paused job scheduler by recreating it with its original configuration.
Note: This requires the scheduler to be part of the predefined schedulers.

schedulerId.description: ID of the scheduler to resume

400.description: Invalid request body or unknown scheduler

post.description:
Manually triggers the warehouse processing job to run immediately.
This will process unprocessed warehouse records from the scrape table.

Manually triggers the condominium processing job to run immediately.
This will process unprocessed condominium records from the scrape table.

post.summary: Manually trigger house and lot processing
post.description:
Manually triggers the house and lot processing job to run immediately.
This will process unprocessed house and lot records from the scrape table.

404.description: No unprocessed house and lots found

message.example: No unprocessed house and lots found

post.description:
Manually triggers the vacant lot processing job to run immediately.
This will process unprocessed vacant lot/land records from the scrape table.

Manually triggers the cleanup job to remove invalid scrape records
such as GTM dataLayer objects and analytics tracking data.

post.summary: Aggressively search and process potential warehouse records
post.description:
Performs an aggressive search for warehouse records by looking in:
- Property type field (case-insensitive)
- Data content for warehouse-related keywords
- Records with warehouse-specific fields

message.example: No potential warehouses found with aggressive search

post.summary: Aggressively search and process potential condominium records
post.description:
Performs an aggressive search for condominium records by looking in:
- Property type field for 'condominium' or 'condo' (case-insensitive)
- Data content for condominium-related keywords (residential unit, tower, residences)
- Records with condominium-specific fields (floor_area, bedrooms, bathrooms, amenities)
- Excludes records that appear to be warehouses or houses

message.example: No potential condominiums found with aggressive search

post.summary: Aggressively search and process potential house and lot records
post.description:
Performs an aggressive search for house and lot records by looking in:
- Property type field for 'house', 'single-family', or similar (case-insensitive)
- Data content for house-related keywords (bungalow, townhouse, single detached)
- Records with house-specific fields (land_size, lot_size, garage, garden)
- Excludes records that appear to be condominiums or warehouses

404.description: No potential house and lots found

message.example: No potential house and lots found with aggressive search

post.summary: Aggressively search and process potential vacant lot records
post.description:
Performs an aggressive search for vacant lot records by looking in:
- Property type field for 'land', 'lot', or 'vacant' (case-insensitive)
- Data content for vacant lot-related keywords (vacant lot, lot for sale, commercial lot, etc.)
- Records with lot-specific fields (land_size, lot_size, lot_area, sqm, zoning)
- Excludes records that appear to be condominiums, warehouses, or houses

message.example: No potential vacant lots found with aggressive search

post.description:
Provides comprehensive property valuation using AI analysis of market data and comparables.

**Note:** For production use, we recommend using the `/v1/bullmq/enqueue-job` endpoint instead,
which provides asynchronous processing with job tracking. This endpoint may timeout for
complex valuations or high load scenarios.

The service analyzes:
- Recent sales and rental comparables in the area
- Market trends and pricing patterns
- Property features and amenities impact on value
- Location-specific factors affecting valuation

Returns detailed valuation ranges for both sales and rentals, along with supporting data
including comparable properties, market trends, and key investment metrics.

query.propertyDescription: High floor unit with city view

details.query.propertySize: Number must be greater than or equal to 20

post.description:
Generate an SEO-optimized title for a property listing based on property details.
The generated title is tailored to the specific property type and includes relevant details
to improve search visibility and user engagement.

**Property Type Specific Fields:**

**Condominium:**
- Use `buildingName` for the condo building name
- Use `floorArea` for unit size in sqm
- Include `floorNumber` for unit floor level
- Include `bedrooms` and `bathrooms` count
- Include `furnishingStatus` if fully/semi-furnished

**House and Lot:**
- Use `lotSize` for land area in sqm
- Use `floorArea` for house floor area
- Include `numberOfFloors` for multi-storey houses
- Include `hasSwimmingPool`, `hasGarden` for special features

**Warehouse:**
- Use `buildingSize` for warehouse area
- Include `ceilingHeight` in meters
- Include `loadingDocks` count

**Vacant Lot:**
- Use `lotSize` for land area in sqm
- Location is especially important for lots

listingType.description: Whether the property is for sale or rent

propertySize.description: General size in sqm (used if specific size fields not provided)

lotSize.description: Lot size in sqm (for houses/warehouses/vacant lots)

post.summary: Generate AI suggestions for property description
post.description:
Get AI-powered suggestions to enhance a property description based on user input.
The AI generates 3 different versions, each with a different focus, tailored to the
specific property type and target market.

Each suggestion includes both a plain text version and a markdown-formatted version
for flexible display options.

**Property Type Specific Focus:**

**Condominium:**
- Emphasizes lifestyle, convenience, and building amenities
- Highlights proximity to business districts and urban conveniences
- Targets young professionals, families, or investors

**House and Lot:**
- Emphasizes space, privacy, and family living
- Details room configurations and outdoor features
- Targets families or multi-generational households

**Warehouse:**
- Focuses on specifications and logistics advantages
- Emphasizes accessibility and functionality
- Targets businesses and logistics companies

**Vacant Lot:**
- Emphasizes development potential and location advantages
- Mentions zoning and possible uses
- Targets developers, investors, or end-users planning to build

propertyDetails.description: Additional property details to enrich the description

value.userInput: Nice condo with great view near BGC
Spacious family home in a quiet neighborhood

text.description: Plain text version of the enhanced property description (150-300 words)

markdown.description: Markdown-formatted version with bold, italics, bullets, and proper formatting

focus.description: Brief description of what this version emphasizes (5-10 words)

suggestions.text: Experience the epitome of urban living in this stunning 2-bedroom condominium at Avida Towers Turf BGC. This fully furnished 60sqm unit on the 25th floor offers breathtaking city views and modern comfort. The thoughtfully designed space features two bedrooms and one bathroom, perfect for young professionals or small families. Residents enjoy world-class amenities including a swimming pool, fully-equipped gym, and round-the-clock security. Located in the heart of Fort Bonifacio, you're just minutes away from top corporations, international schools, and premium shopping destinations. The building's strategic location provides easy access to BGC's vibrant dining scene and entertainment options. This property represents an excellent investment opportunity in one of Metro Manila's most sought-after addresses. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of BGC's dynamic lifestyle. Schedule your viewing today!
suggestions.markdown:
Experience the **epitome of urban living** in this stunning 2-bedroom condominium at **Avida Towers Turf BGC**. This *fully furnished* 60sqm unit on the **25th floor** offers breathtaking city views and modern comfort.

The thoughtfully designed space features:
 Two spacious bedrooms
 One modern bathroom
 Fully furnished interiors
 Spectacular city views

### Building Amenities
 Swimming pool
 Fully-equipped gym
 24/7 security
 Dedicated parking

Located in the **heart of Fort Bonifacio**, you're just minutes away from:
 Top corporations and business centers
 International schools
 Premium shopping destinations
 BGC's vibrant dining scene

This property represents an **excellent investment opportunity** in one of Metro Manila's most sought-after addresses. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of BGC's dynamic lifestyle.

*Schedule your viewing today!*

suggestions.text: Discover modern convenience in this pristine 2-bedroom unit at Avida Towers Turf BGC. Spanning 60 square meters on the 25th floor, this fully furnished condominium combines functionality with style. The unit features two well-appointed bedrooms and a contemporary bathroom, ideal for professionals seeking comfort and convenience. Building amenities include a refreshing swimming pool, state-of-the-art fitness center, and 24-hour security for your peace of mind. Situated in Fort Bonifacio, Taguig's premier business district, this property offers unparalleled access to corporate offices, shopping centers, and entertainment venues. The strategic location ensures excellent connectivity to major thoroughfares and public transportation. With its competitive price point and high rental demand in the area, this unit presents a smart investment choice. Whether for personal use or rental income, this BGC property delivers exceptional value. Contact us today to arrange an exclusive viewing!
suggestions.markdown:
Discover **modern convenience** in this pristine 2-bedroom unit at **Avida Towers Turf BGC**. Spanning 60 square meters on the 25th floor, this *fully furnished* condominium combines functionality with style.

### Unit Features
 Two well-appointed bedrooms
 Contemporary bathroom
 Fully furnished interiors
 High-floor location with views

### Premium Amenities
 Refreshing swimming pool
 State-of-the-art fitness center
 24-hour security service
 Covered parking space

Situated in **Fort Bonifacio**, Taguig's premier business district, this property offers:
 Unparalleled access to corporate offices
 Premium shopping centers
 Diverse entertainment venues
 Excellent public transportation

With its **competitive price point** and high rental demand in the area, this unit presents a *smart investment choice*. Whether for personal use or rental income, this BGC property delivers exceptional value.

**Contact us today to arrange an exclusive viewing!**

suggestions.text: Welcome to sophisticated city living at Avida Towers Turf BGC. This elegant 2-bedroom condominium on the 25th floor presents 60sqm of carefully curated living space. The fully furnished unit showcases contemporary design with two bedrooms and one bathroom, creating an ideal sanctuary above the bustling city. Residents benefit from exclusive access to premium facilities including a resort-style swimming pool, modern gymnasium, and comprehensive security systems. The Fort Bonifacio location places you at the center of Metro Manila's most dynamic district, surrounded by multinational companies, upscale retail establishments, and gourmet restaurants. The property's high-floor position ensures privacy and stunning views while maintaining easy access to ground-level conveniences. As BGC continues to appreciate in value, this unit offers strong capital growth potential alongside immediate rental opportunities. This is more than a property; it's your gateway to the BGC lifestyle. Inquire now to secure this exceptional opportunity!
suggestions.markdown:
Welcome to **sophisticated city living** at *Avida Towers Turf BGC*. This elegant 2-bedroom condominium on the **25th floor** presents 60sqm of carefully curated living space.

### Elegant Living Space
The fully furnished unit showcases:
 Contemporary design throughout

### **Exclusive Resident Facilities**

### **Prime Fort Bonifacio Location**
Surrounded by:

The property's **high-floor position** ensures:
